title: Hex Sticker
aliases:
  - ../hex-sticker.html
---

```{r, warning = FALSE}
library(hexSticker)

sticker("images/logo-website.png", 
        package = "Tidy Finance", 
        p_size = 20, p_color = "black",
        s_x = 1, s_y = 0.75, s_width = 0.7, s_height = 0.7, asp = 0.9,
        h_color = "#3b9ab2",
        h_fill = "white",
        url = "tidy-finance.org",
        filename = "images/hex-sticker.png")
```
